content: number of stitches it will take to create the width of the wrap the number of stripes of knits and purls can be adjusted as needed directions co 62 sts using long tail method row 1 ws p10 k3 4 times p7 sl the last 3 sts purl wise wyif row 2 rs k10 p3 4 times k7 sl the last 3 sts purl wise wyib continue with row 1 and 2 until approximately 2in before the desired blocked length cast off block to 21in x 62in or your specific width and length finishing fold the wrap in half lengthwise place clips or safety pins approximately 12in in from the folded end and 9in in from the open end try on the wrap and adjust the clips to achieve the desired opening place small buttons along the edge between the two end clips using the loose knit as buttonholes or sew the buttons through both edges the neckline is large enough that the buttons are more for decoration than function
